image_copyright: © Lola Pettway / Artists Rights Society (ARS), New York
text: A rectangular quilt, 98 by 74 inches in size, is decorated in geometric rectangles of irregular sizes, arrangements and colors including shades of yellow, green, and red. The background of the quilt is a muted yellow tone. There is a horizontal stripe of green that borders part of the top end of the quilt, and a horizontal stripe of red borders the bottom of the quilt.
title: "Housetop" variation quilt
